messages.subject: Re: FUN News
messages.msgSnippet: Tamara, Yes, that must be really tough for them.  I hope things improve soon!  I always found the newsletter very motivating and reassuring. Mary Ellen
messages.messageBody:
Tamara,
Yes, that must be really tough for them. I hope things improve soon! I
always found the newsletter very motivating and reassuring.
Mary Ellen

messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: FUN News
messages.msgSnippet: Mary Ellen, I am not sure what their plans are about that.  I had paid for a 2 yr subscription prior to the cancellation.  When I e-mailed them, they said that
messages.messageBody:
Mary Ellen,
I am not sure what their plans are about that. I had paid for a 2 yr
subscription prior to the cancellation. When I e-mailed them, they said
that I could get a refund or coupons to get something from their catalog
for the same price. So far, however, I haven't received either one. I am
trying to give them the benefit of the doubt right now, though. I am sure
that if I were in their shoes, I would forget alot of things right now.
Going through something like a family member with a serious illness can be
very traumatic and wearying for the whole family. I am so scatter-brained
as it is, I would probably not remember to send refunds right away. (I
would probably forget to even pay my bills, or make it to certain
appointments too, but that is just the way I am!) :-) I sure hope that
they plan on sending refunds though, because I would hate to see people
getting upset or angry about the situation. Good luck!
Tammy
--- Tamara Jones
--- free2learn@...
--- EarthLink: It's your Internet.


> Do they plan to issue refunds?
> I too sympathize with their situation, and I did LOVE the
> newsletter.
> But I sent them money in good faith that I would be getting
> something in
> return. Guess I will write to them myself. Thanks for the info,
> Tammy!
> Mary Ellen
> We live in a sedentary society
> yet our bodies were made to do physical work each day.

messages.subject: Re: FUN News
messages.msgSnippet: Do they plan to issue refunds? I too sympathize with their situation, and I did LOVE the newsletter. But I sent them money in good faith that I would be
messages.messageBody:
Do they plan to issue refunds?
I too sympathize with their situation, and I did LOVE the newsletter.
But I sent them money in good faith that I would be getting something in
return. Guess I will write to them myself. Thanks for the info, Tammy!
Mary Ellen
We live in a sedentary society
yet our bodies were made to do physical work each day.

Message: 12
They are unfortunately going to have to discontinue the subscriptions.

messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] FUN News
messages.msgSnippet: Mary Ellen, I also subscribe to FUN News.  After not receiving an issue in ages, I e mailed them to find out what is going on.  They are unfortunately going to
messages.messageBody:
Mary Ellen,
I also subscribe to FUN News. After not receiving an issue in ages, I
e mailed them to find out what is going on. They are unfortunately going
to have to discontinue the subscriptions. I am not sure it will be for a
short time or indefinitely. They have a family member that is seriously
ill, and all of their time is going to be spent with their family (which I
agree is as it should be, don't you?) :-) I will miss their magazine, but
I truly understand and sympathize with them.
Tammy



--- Tamara Jones
--- free2learn@...
--- EarthLink: It's your Internet.


> Does anyone else subscribe to FUN News? I haven't received an
> issue in
> ages. I've only received one since I renewed my subscription over a
> year
> ago.
> Mary Ellen

--- Tamara Jones
--- free2learn@...
--- EarthLink: It's your Internet.

messages.subject: FUN News
messages.msgSnippet: Does anyone else subscribe to FUN News?  I haven t received an issue in ages.  I ve only received one since I renewed my subscription over a year ago. Mary
messages.messageBody:
Does anyone else subscribe to FUN News? I haven't received an issue in
ages. I've only received one since I renewed my subscription over a year
ago.
Mary Ellen
We live in a sedentary society
yet our bodies were made to do physical work each day.
